General.Name: Inner Mongolia Yili Industrial Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Inner Mongolia Yili Industrial Group Co., Ltd. produces and sells dairy products in China and internationally. It offers liquid milk, milk powder, yoghourt, ice cream, and cheese, as well as bottled water. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Hohhot, China.
